text: Nambo soni (pangali ulemwa) kwa aŵala ŵanti ndema jaŵam’bichilile kuti mwasosele chakwela (pakuja ku ngondo), mmwe nikuti: “Nganguchipata chilichose chanti ni kunkwesyapo,” ŵagalawiche aku meso gao galinkulakatisya misosi jamadandausi ligongo lyangachipata chilichose chachatole (chakamuchisya pa ulendowo)
